## Work projects


```{r}
slickR::slickR(
    list.files("img/work/", full.names = TRUE, pattern = 'jpg'),
    objLinks = c(NA, "Network.html", NA),
    height = 400,
    width = '95%') +
  # (slickR(c(,
  #           "Where my cv is going"), slideType = 'p') + 
     settings(autoplay = TRUE)
```

## Personal projects
